issue.title: [Rust] Add benchmark for PrimitiveArrayBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3664](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3664). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add a benchmark for the `PrimitiveArrayBuilder` to measure and track its performance.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3664?focusedCommentId=16676632) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
